articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Vidit Gujrathi holds Carlsen to draw, Praggnanandhaa loses to Caruana - The Indian Express
articles.description: R Praggnanandhaa, the other Indian in the fray, lost to American Fabiano Caruana to remain on 3.5 points and in joint 12th place with two others.
articles.content: Indian Grandmaster Vidit Gujrathi held world No. 1 Magnus Carlsen to a draw in the 11th round of the Tata Steel Masters chess tournament to jointly occupy the fourth place with six points.R Praggnana… [+1982 chars]

articles.author: J Brooks Spector
articles.title: SABRES RATTLE: Any conflict between America and Russia over Ukraine will have a global impact, even on South Africa - Daily Maverick
articles.description: The other day, the US Secretary of State responded to Russian positions on Ukraine, setting out a soft cop/hard cop agenda on the volatile issue.
articles.content: Recently, in Inside Vladimir Putins head what it may mean for Ukraine and everybody else, Daily Maverick sketched much of the historical background to the current question of the Ukraine/Russia confl… [+11450 chars]
